name: Illumina Girls
description:
Illumina Girls is an exhilarating 3D block breaking game with a new sensation.

The controls are very simple. press right cursor key to move the player to the right, press left cursor key to move the player to the left, and that's it!

The level is cleared when all the blocks are broken by hitting back the bouncing ball!

If the ball reaches the bottom of the stage, the player will be damaged.

Calculate the player's position and fine-tune the angle at which the ball is hit back.
